Class ec.util.EqualsHashtable 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.util.GenericHashtable
           |
           +----ec.util.EqualsHashtable
public class EqualsHashtable
extends GenericHashtable
This class is an equals hashtable, that is, it is one whose membership check is Object.equals() and whose hashing behavior is Object.hashCode().

performEquals(Object, Object)
Implementation of method from superclass.
